name: Jet Time Airways for British Airways - 737-700 between Copenhagen and London Heathrow
description:
Welcome to another slightly unusual trip. 

Jet Time are a Danish charter operator. BA had a fleet shortage and hired in this aircraft to cover some of their short haul flights. So, the aircraft is a Jet Time one - as were the crew, but the product was definitely BA all the way!

Enjoy this short report on an unusual aircraft - not often you get to see a 737-700 parked at Heathrow T5!

You can also follow me on:

Twitter, @pauls_trips

Snapchat: pauls_trips
